page.title: 19SUPERNATURAL
page.content: HAUNTED BUILDINGS The Bell and Bottle restaurant (29 44) is supposed to be haunted. It is well over 200 years old and various bumps are supposed to occur at times. Occasionally crockery has been unaccountably broken, and a previous inhabitant said that rooms felt chilly. GHOSTS IN THE OPEN A story persists that the ghost of a Roman soldier walks on the ground above the Roman road in 31 45 on occasions, but no-one has claimed to have seen it. E.S.P. & DIVININGS Several people in the area claim to have E.S.P. but nobody practises it for monetary gains.Several people are diviners; the chairman of Lund Historical Society has used his powers to help locate Roman and other ancient tracks, vanished builings, undergound streams and drains.
